page.title: 07RELIGIONS 1
page.content: There is only one vicar between three Church of England Parishes in this area.One of the parishes is Rotherwick. It has an old church which is made of stone. It was built in the{13th. century}but modernised in the{16th. century.}The bell tower was added in the{17th. century}out of red brick, but the porch and the aisle are quite modern. Two of the windows date from the first half of the{14th. {century}and the rest of them are modern ones carved out of stone. It has an organ and an old font. There are 6 books containing information about weddings,funerals,and baptisms. The font is a plain cylindrical bowl and is probably as old as the{ {12th.century.}
